member.name: D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION
member.summary: Describes how one geometry object is spatially related to another geometry object.

member.name: D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION.D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The relationship between the two geometries cannot be determined. This value is never returned by any D2D method.

member.name: D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION.D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION_DISJOINT
member.summary: The two geometries do not intersect at all.

member.name: D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION.D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION_IS_CONTAINED
member.summary: The instance geometry is entirely contained by the passed-in geometry.

member.name: D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION.D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION_CONTAINS
member.summary: The instance geometry entirely contains the passed-in geometry.

member.name: D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION.D2D1_GEOMETRY_RELATION_OVERLAP
member.summary: The two geometries overlap but neither completely contains the other.
